title: HTTP API parameter mapping for Remove action
description: Using this aws cli command syntax we can add parameter mapping such as removing custom headers from incoming request in HTTP API

introBox.headline: How it works
text: The quotes inside the json payload are escaped using slashes to form a correct syntax for the mapping

snippets.title: Parameter mapping to remove custom headers from Request and Response

authors.headline: Presented by Abhishek Agawane
authors.name: Abhishek Agawane
authors.bio: Abhishek is a Cloud Support Engineer at AWS who focuses on serverless and is passionate about the Cloud space
